channel.title: 2 In 1 Question, May seem Easy PLEASE READ
channel.description:
I would love it if you guys can answer my question. Base: Delta
====================== Questions ======================
1. How do I make the health number in the gameframe x10? I was able to make the hits x10, but it seems weird with out of 99 hp points.
2. How do I get the new HP Point bar?
Thanks

item.title: 2 In 1 Question, May seem Easy PLEASE READ
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I’m pretty sure you can do it server sided. Just make it so that whenever the hp skill string updates in the skill tab it multiplies by 10.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 In 1 Question, May seem Easy PLEASE READ
